data.meanings: by/in/at night (excluding sleep), entered upon or passed the nighttent, house, home Thinking about something and its end resultConcealed or conceived something in the mindA structure of clay or any structure signifying a habitation, an abode or dwelling.Buildings, uninhabited houses, shops, ruins, bazaars, places where the entering is allowed by the owners.Ark of Noah, Mosques, places of worship, Kaabeh or JerusalemA graveHousehold or familyNobilitySudden attack in the night or a surprise attack in the nightRemaining through the night (e.g. bread or water that stays out and becomes stale)
data.sentence: The word وَلِبُيُوتِهِمْ comes from the root ب ي ت and is associated with the meanings: by/in/at night (excluding sleep), entered upon or passed the nighttent, house, home Thinking about something and its end resultConcealed or conceived something in the mindA structure of clay or any structure signifying a habitation, an abode or dwelling.Buildings, uninhabited houses, shops, ruins, bazaars, places where the entering is allowed by the owners.Ark of Noah, Mosques, places of worship, Kaabeh or JerusalemA graveHousehold or familyNobilitySudden attack in the night or a surprise attack in the nightRemaining through the night (e.g. bread or water that stays out and becomes stale)
The word أَبْوَابًا comes from the root ب و ب and is associated with the meanings: door/gate, place of entrance, mode/manner.

data.meanings: glad/delight/happiness/joy/rejoice. sarra - to speak secretly, divulge a secret, manifest a secret. secret, heart, conscience, marriage, origin, choice part, mystery, in private, to conceal/reveal/manifest. sarir - couch/throne.
data.sentence: The word وَسُرُرًا comes from the root س ر ر and is associated with the meanings: glad/delight/happiness/joy/rejoice. sarra - to speak secretly, divulge a secret, manifest a secret. secret, heart, conscience, marriage, origin, choice part, mystery, in private, to conceal/reveal/manifest. sarir - couch/throne.
The word يَتَّكِئُونَ comes from the root و ك ا and is associated with the meanings: to recline.
